content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the family court of walloon brabant on april 2nd 2015 the court addressed several issues related to the dissolution of a matrimonial property regime including the treatment of group insurance benefits rewards for joint assets and sums received from family gifts and inheritances the court made rulings on these matters determining the division of assets and liabilities between the spouses the courts decision required adjustments to the liquidation statement which was supervised by a notary the principles of law used in the decision were based on various articles of the civil code and the judicial code the case involved two parties referred to as mrs l and mr g and their respective lawyers the court made decisions on the division of a group insurance policy the valuation of a gift and the division of funds received from parents overall the court considered the arguments presented by both parties and made decisions accordingly
